item.title: Setting a timer
item.dc:creator: @tau1928 tau1928
item.description:
@tau1928 wrote:

Im trying to figure out where to set a timer… i literrly tried every timer there is but nothing worked this is the code anywase…Btw its for gambling.

if ((objectID == 104 || objectID == 1995 || objectID == 397 || objectID == 378)) { //sec
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 3500000)==false)
{
sM(“You need to have atleast 3.5m to do this!”);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 3500000)==true)
{
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 3500000);
Random RG = new Random();
int event = RG.nextInt(6) + 1; // Generates a random number between 1 - 7
if (event == 1) {
addItem(995,4000000);
sM(“Winner! Congratulations, You have one 4m!”);
}
if (event == 2) {

	addItem(995,1);
	sM("Winner! Congratulations, You have won... 1GP..");
	}
	if (event == 3){

	sM("I'm sorry, You've lost.");

}
if (event == 4){

	addItem(4151,1);
	sM("Winner! Congratulations, You have won an");
	sM("Abyssal whip!");
	}
	if (event == 5){

	addItem(4131,1);
	sM("Winner! You have won, Rune boots.");
	}
	if (event == 6){

	addItem(995,20000000);
	sM("Congratulations " + playerName + " !!!!");
	sM("You have just won 20m!!");
	PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has just won 20m at the gambling chest!";

}
}
}
